name: Outrun (itch) (Pixum, DonGonzo)
description:
Outrun is an autorunner game where you try to stay alive longer than your opponent. It is a vaporwave style, local co-op game designed to be played on one keyboard. Destroy green blocks while avoiding red ones. Collect orange blocks to confuse your opponent and blue blocks to slow down time.

This game was developed during the 2022 Global Game Jam by DonGonzo and Pixum!
